title: Spirited Away
cast: Daveigh Chase, Suzanne Pleshette, Miyu Irino, Rumi Hiiragi
description: As her father nears the end of his life

title: The Book of Boba Fett
cast: Temuera Morrison, Ming-Na Wen, Carey Jones, Frank Trigg
description: Bounty hunter Boba Fett & mercenary Fennec Shand navigate the underworld when they return to Tatooine to claim Jabba the Hutt's old turf.

title: Ragini MMS 2
cast: Sunny Leone, Saahil Prem, Parvin Dabas, Sandhya Mridul, Divya Dutta, Soniya Mehra, Kainaz Motivala, Karan Mehra
description: As her father nears the end of his life

title: Sooryavanshi
cast: Sunny Leone, Saahil Prem, Parvin Dabas, Sandhya Mridul, Divya Dutta, Soniya Mehra, Kainaz Motivala, Karan Mehra
description: With the looming threat of a terrorist attack on Mumbai, ATS chief Sooryavanshi embarks on a mission to hunt for 600 kgs of missing RDX and the conspiring perpetrators.

title: The Dark Knight
cast: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart
description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: Coco
cast: Anthony Gonzalez, Gael Garc√≠a Bernal, Benjamin Bratt, Alanna Ubach
description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

title: Mirror Game
cast: Chanchal Chowdhury, Masuma Rahman Nabila
description: Ayna is an actor and the prison is his stage. He slips into the characters of the powerful convicted in exchange of money and take their place in prison. This strange profession is borne out of a society that doesn't give him a chance to follow his passion of acting, but forces him to act in the real life

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
cast: Tom Holland, Zendaya, Benedict Cumberbatch, Jacob Batalon
description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

title: Inception
cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page, Ken Watanabe
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
cast: Jay Baruchel, Gerard Butler, Christopher Mintz-Plasse, Craig Ferguson
description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: Peacemaker
cast: John Cena, Danielle Brooks, Freddie Stroma, Chukwudi Iwuji
description: Picking up where The Suicide Squad (2021) left off, Peacemaker returns home after recovering from his encounter with Bloodsport - only to discover that his freedom comes at a price.

title: Reacher
cast: Alan Ritchson, Malcolm Goodwin, Willa Fitzgerald, Hugh Thompson
description: Jack Reacher was arrested for murder and now the police need his help. Based on the books by Lee Child.

title: The Walking Dead
cast: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Melissa McBride, Lauren Cohan
description: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

title: The Beatles: Get Back
cast: The Beatles, John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison
description: Documentary about the music group The Beatles featuring in-studio footage that was shot in early 1969 for the 1970 feature film 'Let It Be.'

title: Manifest
cast: Melissa Roxburgh, Josh Dallas, J.R. Ramirez, Daryl Edwards
description: A commercial airliner suddenly reappears after being missing for five years. As those aboard reintegrate into society, they experience guiding voices and visions of events yet to occur, and soon a deeper mystery unfolds.

title: Catching Killers
cast: John Ingram, Jim McIntyre, Dave Reichert, Phil Stanford
description: The investigators behind infamous serial killer cases reveal the harrowing, chilling details of their extraordinary efforts in this true crime series.

title: Chak De! India
cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Vidya Malvade, Sagarika Ghatge, Shilpa Shukla
description: Kabir Khan, the coach of the Indian Women's National Hockey Team, dreams of making his all-girls team emerge victorious against all odds.

title: Attack on Titan
cast: Y√ªki Kaji, Marina Inoue, Josh Grelle, Yui Ishikawa
description: After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

title: Drishyam 2
cast: Mohanlal, Meena, Ansiba, Esther Anil
description: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Georgekutty be able to protect his family this time?

title: Joker
cast: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz, Frances Conroy
description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.
